attributes.action: To send a copy of the Lisbon treaty in full to every household in the uk
attributes.additional_details: Because of brexit and its implications people need to know what the government will be signing up to
attributes.background: Because of the implications of the Lisbon treaty I think every household should have a copy to read so that they can then make an informed opinion .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the Lisbon Treaty came into force in the UK in 2009. So we're not sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You can find the full text of the Lisbon Treaty here:

https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=celex%3A12007L%2FTXT
